title: Modern Calligraphy: Everything You Need to Know to Get Started in Script Calligraphy
author: Molly Suber Thorpe
description: A perfect gift for anyone who wants to learn the 'write' way to craft calligraphy. Calligraphy is about creating something uniquely beautiful, whether to celebrate a special occasion like marriage or to use every day in the form of stationery. In Modern Calligraphy , you can learn from this experienced expert how to master this fresh modern lettering style.
